titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1995 the existing suspension of duty on power-driven weaving machines for weaving fabrics more than 4.9 meters in width.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/22/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 30, 1994, the duty on power-driven weaving machines for weaving fabrics more than 4.9 meters in width.
